format: TypeScript (TSX for React-like syntax with Qwik)
description: This file defines a React-like component in Qwik that implements a Tic-Tac-Toe game with full UI, accessibility features, game logic, audit logging, and styling. It contains game logic functions, UI rendering, state management, and event handling.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the current game board by checking all winning line combinations. Returns 'X', 'O', or null.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Checks if the game board is fully occupied, indicating a potential draw.
